info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 4:29PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Herkimer County through 500 PM EDT... At 429 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Newport, or 8 miles northeast of Utica, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Frankfort, West Frankfort, Harbor, Farrel Corner, Johnson Corners, Carey Corners, Irish Settlement, Martin Corners, Sheaf Corners, West Schuyler, North Frankfort, Windfall, Baker Corners, East Schuyler, Minott Corners and Frankfort Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
